Use files from Google Drive

use_google_files.Rd

This function downloads files from Google Drive to a temporary directory to use when rendering an ESP. Intended for internal use by render_esp.

use_google_files(url, ...)

Arguments

url

The URL of the Google folder with the files
...

passed to googledrive::drive_download (ex, overwrite = TRUE)

Contents

Developed by Abigail Tyrell, Kalei Shotwell.

Made with pkgdown 1.6.1, using preferably template.
